Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: Following the latest developments in Australia people are set to witness more scrutiny on road and rail projects worth more than $120 billion under review by the government. Economists also suggest that the nation's financial status may be in better shape than many assume ahead of the federal budget's release. In addition The Reserve Bank of Australia is set to maintain a hold on its interest rates at 3.6% given signs of slowing consumer spending.
